Document Sources.Sourced Statement: about 96% of residents are Black, and about 91% of homes were built prior to 1978, according to the U.S. Census Bureau.
Document Sources.Source Justification: according to the U.S. Census Bureau

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: To learn more about having a child tested or to schedule a free test, contact your child’s pediatrician, call the Shelby County Health Department at 901-222-9582 or email them at sch.clppp@shelbycountytn.gov.
To have your home tested, call the Shelby County Lead Hazard Control program at 901-222-7605 or the City of Memphis Lead-Safe program at 901-636-5323.
